item.description:
Meet at the New Shanghai Restaurant on Hudson St. After a couple fun games, we'll have relaxed conversation and good Chinese food. Dinner cost is usually between $10-$15 per person. We're going to try a few rounds of group story in Chinese. Each person in order will add a sentence to the story and we'll see what kind of things we come up with. We can also work on ordering in Chinese.

Please RSVP responsibly. Thanks.
item.how_to_find_us: Just ask for the meet up group

group.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Tuesday dinner in Chinatown
